definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Within the first year, 26% of patients 80 years of age stopped taking warfarin .
sentences.chinese: 在第一年中，80歲以上患者中有26%停用華髮林。

sentences.english: Contact DetailsGuang Zhu Garden Building 1, Unit 5, Nan Ping, Zhuhai (opposite Hua Fa New Town Commercial Street - Janes Bar)
sentences.chinese: 珠海市南屏鎮華髮新城商業街對面廣珠花園1棟5號。

sentences.english: Huafa Sanitaryware, quality creates the future.
sentences.chinese: 華髮衛浴，品質鑄就未來。

sentences.english: Soft purple suddenly shouted, Yuehua found soft purple sprained foot, then send her home.
sentences.chinese: 柔紫突然大叫，月華髮現柔紫扭傷腳，於是送她回家。

sentences.english: Between Tim green hair, goes podium finishes laughter.
sentences.chinese: 青絲之間添華髮，三尺講臺蕩笑聲。

sentences.english: Trendy décor, good food and drinks. Nice location in Huafa.
sentences.chinese: 位於華髮新城，裝飾時尚，供應美食和美酒。

sentences.english: If I fall ill some day, there would grow several more gray hairs on my mother's head.
sentences.chinese: 要是我生病了，媽媽頭上肯定又得多幾根華髮。

sentences.english: Take people long on the sickbed have heart disease, he began to deliberately HUAFA temper.
sentences.chinese: 修民久臥病榻產生心病，他開始故意對大華髮脾氣。

sentences.english: The Lord has made his salvation known and revealed his righteousness to the nations.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華髮明瞭他的救恩，在列邦人眼前顯出公義。

sentences.english: The LORD hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華髮明瞭他的救恩，在列邦人眼前顯出公義。

sentences.english: Love never grow old, Locks may be lose their brown and gold.
sentences.chinese: 愛能歷久常新，華髮或許會失去原來的光彩。

sentences.english: And the peaceable habitations are cut down because of the fierce anger of the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華髮出猛烈的怒氣，平安的羊圈就都寂靜無聲。

definition: a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
fine black hair/dried plum (sliced, as cake ingredient)
